categories: Category:Songs by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes

nodes.text: "Modal Notes" was a song performed by the band Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes. The song was one of many played by R-3X at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost.
"Modal Notes" was first played for the public during the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge panel at Celebration Chicago.
